com.wikitude.architect
Interface ArchitectView.SensorAccuracyChangeListener

Enclosing class:
ArchitectView
public static interface ArchitectView.SensorAccuracyChangeListener

Listener interface that allows to get notifications when the accuracy of the device's sensors have changed An implementing class can register itself using the methods provided by the ArchitectView class

Method Summary
 void onCompassAccuracyChanged(int accuracy)
           Callback Method of the Interface SensorAccuracyChangeListener.
 

Method Detail

onCompassAccuracyChanged

void onCompassAccuracyChanged(int accuracy)

Callback Method of the Interface SensorAccuracyChangeListener. Register an instance of this interface as listener at com.wikitude.architect.ArchitectWebView#. This Method is called when the accuracy of the Compass has changed

See SensorEventListener.onAccuracyChanged(Sensor, int) for details.

Parameters:
accuracy - The Compass Accuracy: SENSOR_STATUS_UNRELIABLE, SENSOR_STATUS_ACCURACY_LOW, SENSOR_STATUS_ACCURACY_MEDIUM, SENSOR_STATUS_ACCURACY_HIGH
